description: I build responsive, scalable web applications using modern technologies like React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
I specialize in crafting dynamic, user-friendly interfaces with React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.
I design and implement RESTful APIs and handle server-side logic using Node.js, Express, and database management systems like SQL and MongoDB.
I provide seamless integration of third-party APIs to enhance application functionality, from payment gateways to social media services.
I create and manage databases, ensuring data integrity and optimization with SQL, MongoDB, and other database systems.
I offer expert advice on software architecture, code reviews, and technology stack decisions to ensure the best performance and scalability.
